instruction: Rash burning at night, concern about medication duration and interaction.

attributes.comment: Rash burning at night, concern about medication duration and interaction.

instruction: Continue taking valacyclovir as prescribed, one 1-gram tablet after breakfast each day until Sunday. Swallow with a full glass of water.

attributes.comment: Continue taking valacyclovir as prescribed, one 1-gram tablet after breakfast each day until Sunday. Swallow with a full glass of water.

instruction: Take Vitamin D3 chewable tablet right after lunch; it won't interact with valacyclovir.

attributes.comment: Take Vitamin D3 chewable tablet right after lunch; it won't interact with valacyclovir.

instruction: If the pharmacy changes the brand of valacyclovir, continue taking the medication as per the blister pack and inform the staff.

attributes.comment: If the pharmacy changes the brand of valacyclovir, continue taking the medication as per the blister pack and inform the staff.
